reviewText: We loved this dvd.  He is so funny. dvd came in good condition and brought us hours of laughter.  we passed it on to family.

This is the highest rating I can give Yakov.  He is the number one comedian that I have ever listened to.  Anyone can listen to him and not be offended by any of his comedy.  His language is clean and we can listen to him as a family and enjoy a hearty laugh.  Very relaxing time spent listening to Yakov. Best comedian we have ever heard and enjoyed as much. Very touched by his life story.
